signal_description: Retrieve the sum of all 'Last Invoice Item Amount' columns from the 'defaultview-545' table.
llm_output:
{
"signal_description": "Retrieve the sum of all 'Last Invoice Item Amount' columns from the 'defaultview-545' table."
}

This signal_description was constructed by analyzing the SIGNAL query and breaking it down into its component parts.

* The first part of the query is "SELECT sum", which indicates that we are selecting a summary statistic of a column.
* The next part is "("Last Invoice Item Amount")", which specifies the column name and its alias.
* The final part is "FROM "defaultview-545"", which specifies the table name from which we are selecting the data.

Using this information, we can construct a human-readable description of the query that references the table name, column names, and respective values. In this case, the description is "Retrieve the sum of all 'Last Invoice Item Amount' columns from the 'defaultview-545' table."
